name: Rock UR Look: Fashion Show - A Facebook Game (Canceled)
blurb: Fashion Show is a Facebook game in which you hire models, purchase clothes and design shows or compete against others in a showdown

rewards.reward: Love our outtakes?  If we made you laugh, please consider pledging $1.  Every dollar counts.  We have a ton of video and will continue to post more in the near future.  Thanks for helping to fund our game.

Beta Tester.  Want to be the first to try out the game?  Select this reward and you will receive access to the closed beta version of the game.  You will also receive access to our staging environment where you can preview new changes before they go live.

More Coins.  You will receive the Beta Tester rewards and an additional 5000 coins to hire models and purchase clothes.  Use these coins to move through the first jobs with ease and acquire the best clothing before your friends snatch them up!

RURL Dollars.  In addition to the Beta Tester and More Coins rewards, you will receive an additional 100 RURL dollars to spend in our stores.  Players use RURL dollars to purchase rare, designer-style clothing.

Game Changer.  Receive access to our enhancements website.  Make recommendations for enhancements to the game, clothing ideas, new jobs, achievements or judging styles.  This level also gives you the following rewards: Beta Tester, More Coins, RURL Dollars.

Founding Member.  Become a founding member and gain access to the exclusive Founder's Club store where you can purchase limited edition clothes.  This level also gives you the following rewards: Beta Tester, More Coins, RURL Dollars, Game Changer.

Free Clothing.  Pick from a selection of exclusive clothing.  Show off your best style by choosing an exclusive dress, handbag, or shoes.  This level also gives you the following rewards: Beta Tester, More Coins, RURL Dollars, Game Changer, Founding Member.

Job Creator.  Who said only the government can create jobs?  By selecting this reward, we will work with you to create your own in-game job.  You will be able to determine the criteria, pay scale and name this job.  This level also gives you the following rewards: Beta Tester, More Coins, RURL Dollars, Game Changer, Founding Member, Free Clothing.

Fashion Designer.  Ever wanted to design your own clothing?  Have a favorite purse or dress you want use in the game?  Select this reward and we will work with you to bring your clothing to RURL.  Simply send us a photo or drawing of what you are thinking and we'll take it from there.  You can also name the item, decide it's price, and set whether the item is exclusive to you or can be bought by a group of your friends or everyone.  Once you have approved it, we will deliver it to your in-game closet to show off to your friends.\r\n\r\nThis level also gives you the following rewards: Beta Tester, More Coins, RURL Dollars, Game Changer, Founding Member, Free Clothing, Job Creator.

SuperModel.  Want to be immortalized?   Select this reward and send us a photo of yourself and we will create an in-game model using your name and likeness.  Don't want to use your likeness, send us an idea of what you want to look like and a name you want to use.  We'll work with you to create the perfect model.  Are you a real model looking for exposure?  We can even link to your website from your model profile.\r\n\r\nThis level also gives you the following rewards: Beta Tester, More Coins, RURL Dollars, Game Changer, Founding Member, Free Clothing, Job Creator.

Judge.  Ever wanted to judge a fashion show?  Now is your chance.  Pledge for this reward and we will create a judge in your likeness and a name you provide.  You can also bring your personal style to the way that he/she scores a runway show.\r\n\r\nThis level also gives you the following rewards: Beta Tester, More Coins, RURL Dollars, Game Changer, Founding Member, Free Clothing, Job Creator.

Store Owner.  Want to be seen by everyone?  We will name a store whatever you want (non-offensive).  You can also select the type of apparel it carries.  Want to have a bridal shop?  No problem.  Want to have a high-end shoe store?  Of course.  Want to have a second-hand 80s store?  You got it.  Bring us your vision and we'll work with you to create it.\r\n\r\nThis level also gives you the following rewards: Beta Tester, More Coins, RURL Dollars, Game Changer, Founding Member, Free Clothing, Job Creator.
